text: Isthmian is the adjective pertaining to an isthmus It may also refer to: * Isthmian Games, one of the Panhellenic Games of Ancient Greece * Isthmian League, a regional football league covering London and South East England * Isthmian script, one of the Mesoamerican writing-systems * Isthmian Steamship Company, a shipping company * Isthmian Canal Commission, an American administration commission set up to oversee the construction of the Panama Canal ==See also== * Isthmia (disambiguation) * Isthmus (disambiguation)
title: Isthmian
